<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Pernicious Spore Bomb](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1515)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=21" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 78</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This flask contains fast-growing mold spores, which quickly take root but just as quickly rot away. A pernicious spore bomb deals the listed poison damage, [persistent piercing damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), and [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage. Many types grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs=""
>
Pernicious Spore Bomb (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 78</row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bomb deals 1 poison damage, 1d4 persistent piercing damage, and 1 poison splash damage. Except on a critical failure, one square of the target creature's space is coated in vegetation, becoming difficult terrain for 1 round.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs=""
>
Pernicious Spore Bomb (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 78</row>

**Price** 10 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 2 poison damage, 2d4 persistent piercing damage, and 2 poison splash damage. Except on a critical failure, the bomb's splash area is coated in vegetation, becoming difficult terrain for 1 round.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs=""
>

</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 78</row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 3 poison damage, 3d4 persistent piercing damage, and 3 poison splash damage. Except on a critical failure, the bomb's splash area is coated in vegetation, becoming difficult terrain for 1 round.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs=""
>
Pernicious Spore Bomb (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 78</row>

**Price** 2,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 4 poison damage, 4d4 persistent piercing damage, and 4 poison splash damage. Except on a critical failure, the bomb's splash area is coated in vegetation, becoming difficult terrain for 1 minute.
